content: You don't have users with emails. Please proceed to the next step to add them.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when adding users with emails in an email data import process. The text informs users that they don't have any existing users with emails and prompts them to proceed to add some. It appears as a prominent notification within the PortalSettings categories page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinulla ei ole käyttäjiä sähköpostiosoitteilla. Jatka seuraavaan vaiheeseen lisätäksesi heidät.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Ole hyvä' is overly formal and not commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'Ole hyvä' for a more conversational tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'adresse e-mail' is technically correct but a more natural and common phrasing in French would be 'adresses e-mail'. The possessive 'les' is also needed to correctly refer to the users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Il n'y a aucun utilisateur avec des adresses e-mail. Veuillez passer à l'étape suivante pour les ajouter.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Դուք էլ․փոստով օգտվողներ չունեք:' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Armenian.  'էլ․փոստով' feels a bit forced.  It implies there are other types of users that are not email users, which isn't necessarily conveyed in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more direct translation like 'Ձեր մոտ չկան էլ․փոստի հետ կապված օգտվողներ։'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after the first sentence feels a bit abrupt.  It might be better to integrate the second part more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Combine the two sentences into one: 'Ձեր մոտ չկան էլ․փոստի հետ կապված օգտվողներ։ Խնդրում ենք անցնել հաջորդ քայլին՝ դրանք ավելացնելու համար։'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Korean. The phrase '이메일이 있는 사용자가 없습니다' is repetitive.  A more natural phrasing would be something like '이메일 주소를 가진 사용자가 없습니다.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이메일 주소를 가진 사용자가 없습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The second part, '이메일이 있는 사용자를 추가하려면 다음 단계를 진행하세요,' also sounds awkward. A better wording would indicate adding email addresses to user accounts, not users with emails.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이메일 주소를 추가하려면 다음 단계를 진행하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ທ່ານບໍ່ມີຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີອີເມວ. ກະລຸນາດໍາເນີນຂັ້ນຕອນຕໍ່ໄປເພື່ອເພີ່ມພວກມັນ.' is a literal translation but could be improved for naturalness in Lao. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານບໍ່ມີຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີອີເມວ. ກະລຸນາໄປສູ່ຂັ້ນຕອນຕໍ່ໄປເພື່ອເພີ່ມອີເມວຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Jums nav lietotāju ar e-pasta ziņojumiem" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning naturally in Latvian. The phrase "e-pasta ziņojumiem" is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jums nav lietotāju ar e-pastiem. Pārejiet pie nākamās darbības, lai tos pievienotu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order in the suggestion may be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jums nav lietotājiem ar e-pastiem. Pārejiet pie nākamās darbības, lai tos pievienotu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබට වි-තැපෑලක් සහිත පරිශ්‍රීලකයින් නැත' is not a natural or accurate rendering of 'You don't have users with emails.' A more accurate translation would focus on the lack of users with email addresses.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට වි-තැපෑල ලිපිනයක් සහිත පරිශ්‍රීලකයින් කිසිවෙකු නොමැත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'එකතු කිරීමට' (to add) feels clunky in this context. It's a more formal way of saying 'to add'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එකතු කිරීමට වෙනුවට 'ඇමුණු ගැනීමට' හෝ 'එකතු කිරීමට' වඩා සුදුසු වනු ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ඊළඟ පියවරට යන්න' is slightly formal. A more conversational phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඊළඟ පියවරට යන්න' වෙනුවට 'ඊළඟ පියවරට ගොස්' හෝ 'ඊළඟ පියවරේට යන්න' භාවිතා කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Nemáte používateľov, ktorí majú uvedený e-mail' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally as it could. 'Uvedený e-mail' (listed email) is less common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nemáte používateľov s e-mailovou adresou. Prejdite na ďalší krok a pridajte ich.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'email-ом' is not idiomatic Serbian. The possessive suffix is incorrect and unnecessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Немате кориснике са емаил адресама.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'емаил' is an Anglicism. Using the Serbian equivalent 'електронска пошта' would be more appropriate for a polished feel, though 'емаил адреса' is acceptable as a compromise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Немате кориснике са електронском поштом. Молимо пређите на следећи корак да их додате.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nemate korisnike sa email-om' is overly literal. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'Nema korisnika sa e-mail adresom' or 'Nema korisnika sa e-mail adresama'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nema korisnika sa e-mail adresom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'email-om' is a genitive case which isn't the most common or natural usage here. While grammatically correct, it feels stilted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: e-mail adresom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a hard error, using 'e-mail' (hyphenated) consistently would improve readability and match common Serbian usage for email addresses.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'E-postası olan kullanıcılarınız yok.' is a bit awkward. A more natural Turkish phrasing would be 'E-postası bulunan kullanıcılarınız yok.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: E-postası bulunan kullanıcılarınız yok.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "您没有拥有电子邮件的用户" is a literal and slightly awkward translation of "You don't have users with emails." A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您还没有添加电子邮件用户。 (You haven't added email users yet.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky. It could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您还没有添加电子邮件用户，请继续执行下一步。 (You haven't added email users yet, please proceed to the next step.)
